application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: Det affect health and app of tree
description: 1 x Lime (applicants ref. T1) - Height 22m. spread 10m.  Reduce in height by 5m and 2-3m reduction from the sides with sufficient clearance to property side. Final height 17m Final Spread 7-8m. Lift branches from the road side and over the driveway to 3m. Standing in Group G13 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Lime (applicants ref. T2) - Height 22m, spread 10m. Reduce in height by 5m and 2-3m reduction from the sides with sufficient clearance to property side. Final height 17m Final Spread 7-8m. Lift branches from the road side and over the driveway to 3m. Standing in Group G13 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Lime (applicants ref. T3) - Height 20m, spread 10m. Reduce in height by 5m and 2-3m reduction from the sides with sufficient clearance to property side. Final height 15m Final Spread 7-8m. Lift branches from the road side and over the driveway to 3m. Standing in Group G13 of Tree Preservation Order.
